CHAPTER.VERS: Pasian’ deihna tawh Jesuh Khrih’ sawltak dingin a hong kiseh keimah Paul le i sanggam Timoti in,
Kolose khua-ah a om Pasian’ mi ahi, Khrih sungah kiptakin a om sanggamte tungah lai ka hong khak uh hi.I Pa Pasian in note tungah dikna le nopsakna thupha hong tungsak tahen.
Note in Khrih Jesuh na muanna uh le Pasian’ mite khempeuh na itna thu uh za ka hih manun note ading thu ka hong ngetsak uh ciangin i Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa Pasian tungah lungdamna ka ko tawntung uh hi.
Thu dang na zakma un, lungdamna thuman taktak na zak uh ciangin lametna na nei uh hi. Note adingin vantungah a hong kikoihsak tua lametna hangin note in muanna le itna a nei na hi uh hi.

Note in Pasian hong hehpihna thu za-in, ahi bangbangin na theih hun uh a kipanin thupha na ngah uh bangin leitung midang khempeuh tungah zong lungdamna thu in thupha tunin, leitung khempeuh ah a kizel ahi hi.
Hih thu pen, Khrih nasepna sungah kote’ tangin citakin na a sem, kote’ naseppih Epafras tung panin na zak uh ahi hi.
Amah in, Kha Siangtho’ piak itna na neihna uh zong, kote kiangah a hong gen hi.
Tua bangin note’ thu ka zak uh hun a kipanin Pasian kiangah thu ka hong ngetsak uh a, kha thu tawh kisai pilna le theihtelnate nei-in, Pasian’ deihna na theih theih nadingun ka hong ngetsak uh hi.

Tua bang hileh Topa’ deihna bangin nungta-in, amah a lungkimsak ding thute bek na sem tawntung ding uh a, na gamtatnate uh a hoih bekbek hong hi-in, Pasian’ thu na theihna uh hong khang semsem ding hi.

Note in lungduai maitai takin thuak zo-in, khuavak gam sungah a om Pasian’ mite tawh nopsakna a ngahkhawm thei dingin a hong bawl i Pa tungah lungdamna na koh theih nadingun a minthang ama vangliatna in note tungah thahatna hong guan tahen.
Amah in khuamial vangliatna panin eite hong hon khia-in, a lungmuanhuaina mun, a it a Tapa’ ukna sungah hong koih a,
tua a Tapa in eite hong khah khia a, i mawhna hong kimaisak khinta hi.
Khrih pen a kimu thei lo Pasian’ lim hi a, a kipiangsak khempeuh lakah tapa upa pen ahi hi.

Vantung le leitungah a om na khempeuh, kha thu tawh kisai vangliatna, tote, mi ukte, aana neihnate a kipan a kimu thei hitaleh a kimu thei lo hitaleh na khempeuh, Pasian in amah zangin a piangsak hi. Leitung a kipanin huih lakah a om khempeuh dongin, Pasian in Khrih adingin a mahmah zangin a piangsak hi.
Na khempeuh khat beek a om ma-in amah om khinta a, amah tawh a kipawl manin na khempeuh ama mun sansanah hoihtakin a om thei hi.
Na khempeuh ah amah a lian pen ahih theih nadingin, amah pen pawlpi ahi ama pumpi lutang hi a, pawlpi’ nuntakna a kipatna hi a, sihna panin a kithokiksak Tapa cil ahi hi.
Tua Tapa in Pasian’ pianzia a kimin a neih nading, Pasian mahmah in a sehsa ahi hi.

Pasian in a Tapa zangin na khempeuh ama kiangah a kaihkik ding a sehsa ahi hi. Tua ahih manin singlamteh tungah a Tapa a sihna hangin amah tawh kilemkik theih nading hong omsak ahih manin, leitung, vantung a om khempeuh ama kiangah a hong tunkik ahi hi.
A beisa hunah note’ lungsim gitlohna le gamtatsiatna hangin Pasian tawh kigamla-in Pasian’ gal na hi uh hi.
Ahi zongin, a Tapa a pumpi mahmahin a hong sihna hangin note, a cidam, a siangtho, paubaanna om hetloin ama kiangah hong lak theih nadingin Pasian in note ama lawmin a hong bawl khinta ahi hi.

Ahi zongin note in lungdamna thu na zak cil lai-un na neih uh lametna panin liing hetloin, bulkip nei-in citakin na om paisuak ding uh ahi hi. Tua lungdamna thu mah keimah Paul in hilhin ka sepbel hi a, leitung mun khempeuh ah a kihilh lungdamna thu mah ahi hi.
Tu-in ka pumpi-in ka thuakna tawh Khrih in ama pumpi ahi pawlpi adingin a thuak ding a kisam laiteng a kitangcingsak suak ka hih manin note adingin ka thuakna thu-ah ka lung a dam hi.
Pasian’ thu a kicing takin note’ phattuam nadingin a hilh dingin pawlpi nasem dingin Pasian in kei a hong bawl hi.
Tua thuhilh ding pen a beisa hunah a ki-imcip thu hi a, ahi zongin tu-in Pasian’ mite tungah a kipholak ta ahi hi.

Pasian in mi khempeuh adingin a koihcing hih a thupi a deihhuai a thusim pen ama mite tungah pholak ding a sawm ahi hi. Tua thusim in: Khrih tawh a kipawlte in Pasian tawh minthanna ngahkhawm ding hi, cihna ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin a milip tungah Khrih’ thu ka hilh uh a, Khrih tawh a kipawlna uh hangin a milipin a khangcingin Pasian’ omna-ah ka tunpih theih nadingun a milip tungah hilhin ka gen khol uh hi.
Hih bang a tangtun theih nadingin Khrih in kei tungah a hong piak ka thahatna khempeuh zangin, nakpitakin na semin ka hanciam hi.
Note a kipan Laodisia khuamite le kei a hong thei ngei nai lo mi khempeuhte ading nangawnin hahkat takin na ka sem hi.

Note, lungsim hanna tawh kidimin, thu a man taktakin na theihna hangun lungkip takin omin, itna tawh pumkhat na suah theih nading uh ka deihna ahi hi. Tua hileh Pasian’ thusim ahi Khrih mahmah na thei ding uh hi.
Khrih pen Pasian’ pilna le a thuthuk khempeuh a kitheih theih nading ahi hi.
Kuamah in note a hong khem zawh loh nadingin hih bang thu a hong gen ka hi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hangin ka lungsimin note tawh ka hong omkhawm a, Khrih na upna uh hangin kiptakin na omkhawmna uh ka theih manin ka nuam mahmah hi.
Note hong honpa dingin Topa Khrih na sansa uh ahih mah bangin amah tawh hoihtakin kipawlin nungta un.
Note tungah a hong kihilhsa bangin ama sungah zungthuk kha unla, ama deihna bangin nungta-in, na upna uhah khauh semsemin, lungdam takin om un.
Khrih thu tawh a kituak lopi-in, tangthu tuanthu ahi a, huihlak a ukte’ thu siksanin ahi zongin, bangmahin a kimang lo leitung pilna tawh mite’ khemsa-in sila na suahkhak loh nadingun kingaihsun un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh mihing hong suahna sungah Khrih in Pasian’ pianzia khempeuh a kimtakin nei a,
Khrih tawh na kipawlna hangun nuntakna kicing na nei uh hi. Huihlak a ukte le aana neite khempeuh tungah amah a lutangpi hi lai hi.
Amah tawh na kipawlna uh hangin mihingte in pumpi vun a at uh bang hi loin, Khrih’ vun-atna ahi mawhnopna lungsim tawh kipelhna a ngah khinta na hi uh hi.
Note tui na kiphum uh ciangin Jesuh tawh kiphum khawmin, misite’ lak panin Khrih a thosak Pasian’ vangliatna na up manun Khrih mah tawh tuiphumna panin a thokhawm leuleu na hi uh hi.

A beisa hunah na mawhna uh hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi na hi uh a, Gentail mi na hih manun Thukham nei lote na hi uh hi. Ahi zongin Khrih hangin Pasian in note hong hingsak a, i mawhna khempeuh hong maisak khinta hi.
Eite adingin a hoih lo, i mawhna a kiciamtehna khempeuh, hong phiatsak a, tuate khempeuh singlamteh tungah kilhcipin a beisak ta hi.
Amah in huihlak a ukte le vangliatna a nei khempeuh, singlamteh tungah zo gawp khin a, gal zote in a sal matte a kaih uh bangin mi khempeuh muhin a gualzawhna a lak hi.
Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, biakna pawite, Khadet pawi le Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in kuamah in ngeina zuih ding bawl kei un.
Hihte pen mailam ah a hong piang ding nate’ lim hi lel a, ahi zongin tu-in a taktak ahi Khrih hong omta hi.

Maang a muhna hangun a thupi diakin kingaihsunin, a kilawm lo zah dongin kiniamkhiat nading le vantung mite biak ding a hong hanthawn mite’ khemsa-in ta kei un. Tua bang mite pen amau’ ngaihsut tawmna tawh a kihisak mawk hi a,
lutang ahi Khrih a len nawn lo uh ahi hi. Lutang ahi Khrih’ ukna tawh pumpi na khempeuh kizom dimdiam uh ahih manin pumpi in thahatna ngah a, Pasian’ deih bangin a khangto hi.

Khrih tawh sikhawm khin na hih manun huihlak a ukte’ khut sung panin a suakta khin na hi uh hi. Tua hinapi-in, bang hangin hih leitung mite bangin gamta na hi uh hiam? Bang hangin ngeina a tuamtuamte,
“Lawng kei un, ciam kei un, su kei un,” cihte zuihin nei na hi uh hiam?
Hih nate pen i nek, i zat khit ciangin a mai mang hi lel a, mihingte’ bawltawm thuhilhna le ngeina hi lel hi.

Hih bang gamtatnate pen a tungthamin i et ciangin limtakin biaknopna lungsim a piangsak ding, kiniamkhiatna a piangsak ding, pumpi ki-uk zawhna a piangsak ding tawh kibang hi. Ahi zongin a taktakin hihte khat beek in pumpi ki-uk zawhna piangsak zo lo hi.
Note pen Khrih tawh a thokik khinte na hih manun, Pasian’ taklam a kumpi tokhom tungah Khrih a tutna mun vantung thute ngaihsutin nei un.
Vantungah a om thute ngaihsutin nei unla, leitungah a om thute ngaihsutin nei kei un.
Note a sikhin na hi uh a, note’ nuntakna pen Khrih tawh Pasian’ sungah a kiseelkhawm ahi hi.
Note’ nuntakna taktak Khrih ahih manin amah hong kilat ciangin note zong amah tawh hong kilang khawmin amah tawh na minthang khawm ding uh hi.
Tua ahih manin nulepa mawhna, a kilawm lo gamtatna, hukna lanna, a hoih lo lunggulhna le milim biakna nam khat ahih manin huaihamna ahi note sungah a om leitung lungsimte na sisak un.
Ama thu a mang lo mite tungah hih bang gamtatna hangin Pasian’ hehna hong tung ding hi.
Note pen hih bangin gamta-in a nungta ngeite na hi uh hi.
Ahi zongin tu-in hehna, thangpaihna, muhdahna, gensiatna, kam hoih lo pauna cihte nei nawn kei un.
Ngeina lui le gamtatna lui khempeuh a beisakkhin na hihna uh kithei-in khatlekhat tungah zuauthu kigen nawn kei unla,
ngeina thak tawh kituakin gamta un. Eite a hong piangsak Pasian a kicing takin i theih semsem nadingin amah a sun dingin a hong thakbawl tawntung ahi hi.

Tua ahih manin Gentail mi le Jew mi, vun-at mi le vun-at loh mi, khuapi mi le khuaneu mi, sila le sila ahi lo, cih bangin a kilamdanna om lo a, Khrih pen mi khempeuh ading hi thei a, thu khempeuh ading hi thei a, thu khempeuh ah amah bek ahi hi.
Pasian in note hong itin, hong teelin, ama mi siangthote hikhin na hih manun note pen hehpihna nei-in, migi-in, kiniamkhiatin, dikin, na lungduai ding uh ahi hi.

Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkim lo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note’ mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh banah, mi khempeuh kilem takin a hong om khawmsak thei ahi ki-itna na bulphuh un.
Note pumkhat suakin a lungdam khawm dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahih mah bangin Khrih hong piak nopsakna in note’ lungsim hong uk ta henla, lungdamin om ta un.
Khrih thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om henla, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte le biakna late na sa un.
Na kampauna, na gamtatnate khempeuh uhah, Topa Jesuh hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Jesuh min paulamin na hih ding uh hi.
Zite aw, Khristiante gamtat dingin a kilawm ahih mah bangin na pasalte uh thu na mang un.
Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amaute tungah ngongtat kei un.
Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man tawntung ding pen na Khristian nasep uh ahi hi. Tua bang thumanna in Pasian lungdamsak hi.
Pate aw, na tate un a thuak zawh loh zah dong dingin thuhilhin taii niloh kei un.
Silate aw, thu khempeuh ah na leitung topa uh thu na mang un. Amau’ hong pahtak ding deihna tawh a hong muh sung bekin a hoihtatte hi kei unla, Topa na zahtakna uh hangin lungsim tak tawh gamta un.
Mite’ nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian’ nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un.
Topa in note tungah thaman a hong piak ding lamtak phawk gige un. Tua bangin na sepna uhah Khrih Topa’ na a semsem na hi uh hi.
A man loin a gamtate in ahihleh a gamtatna bangun thuak ding uh hi. Pasian in kuamah deidan loin amau’ gamtatna bang ciatin thu a khen ahi hi.
Tote aw, note in zong vantungah To khat na neihna uh phawk unla, na silate uh a kilawm a kituakin bawl un.
Lungsim takpi tawh thu ngen tawntung unla, kidawm kawmin lungdamna tawh thu ngen un.
Mite kiangah Khrih’ thusim hilh theih nadingin Pasian in kote tungah hunpha hong piak theih nadingin thu hong ngetsak un. Ka thongkiatna pen hih thu hang mah ahi hi.
Mite’ teltheih dingin a kitel takin ka gen theih nadingin thu hong ngetsak un.
A pualam mite tungah a kilawm a kituakin gamta unla, hunhoih na ngah khempeuh uh na valkhongsak ngei kei un.
Kam na pau uh ciangin mi’ zaknop, mi’ ngaihnop dingin na pau un. Tua hileh na kihopih uh mite khempeuh adingin phattuamna a nei kam a pau na hi ding uh hi.
Topa’ nasepna-ah citakin a manpha mahmah ka naseppih uh ka sanggam uh Tikhikas in kei’ thu a kicing takin note kiangah hong gen ding hi.
Hih lai-a kote’ omzia hong gen ciangin note’ lungsim a nop theih nadingin amah a hong paisak ka hi hi.
Note’ khuapih mi, a citak i sanggam it pa Onesimas zong ka hong zuisak hi. Amau tegel in hih lai-a thupiang khempeuh note kiangah hong gen ding uh hi.
Kei tawh thong a kiakhawm Aristarkhas in note hong hopih hi. Barnabas’ sanggamnu’ tapa Marka in zong hong hopih hi (amah hong pai ciangin hoihtakin na pawlbawl un, ci-a hong kigen pa ahi hi).

Justas zong a kici zel Jesuh in zong note hong hopih hi. Vun-atna a zang Jew mi Khristian a hong suakte lak panin hih mi thumte bek, Pasian thu-ah ka naseppih lakah a hong kihel ahi hi. Ka nasepna-ah amaute in nakpitakin hong huh uh hi.
Jesuh Khrih nasem, note’ makai Epafras in zong hong hopih hi. Pasian’ deihna bangin note nungta-in, lungsim khanghamin kiptakin na omtheih nadingun amah in thu hong ngetsak tawntung hi.
Amah in note-a’ ding a kipan Laodisia khua le Hierapolis khua mite adingin nakpitakin na a sepna thu ka thei hi.
I it siavuanpa Luka le Demas in zong hong hopih uh hi.
Laodisia khua-a om i sanggamte le Nymfas le ama inn-a a kikhawm pawlpi mite na hopihsak un.
Hih ka hong laikhak na sim khit uh ciangin Laodisia khua-a om pawlpite zong na simsak unla, Laodisia khua pawlpite kiang pan hong pai ding lai zong note in na sim hamtang un.
Tua ciangin Arkhippas kiangah, “Pasian adingin nasepna nang tungah hong kipia pen hoihtakin na zo in,” ci-in na gen un.

Keimah Paul’ khut mahmah tawh,Note ka hong hopih hi,cihna lai ka gelh ahi hi. Sikkhau khihna ka thuakna thu mangngilh kei un. Note khempeuh tungah Pasian’ hehpihna thupha hong tung tahen.Note ka hong hopih hi,
